title: You and your school council
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Decision-making
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Parent participation
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/School management and organisation
description: Highlights the new roles and responsibilities of school councils. Emphasizes the participation of parents, students and teachers in school governance; and the importance of collaborative decision making in developing school policies and priorities. Encourages parents to become involved in school councils.
